nodes.text: The Christoph system was a star system in the Savareen sector of the Outer Rim Territories along the Corellian Run. The system was named after its dominant inhabitants, the Christophsians. The system had two major planetary orbits. In the outer orbit was the gas giant world Erodsis, with its host of twenty-two moons. In the inner orbit was Christophsis, the system's only habitable planet, which orbited by a moon.
